Name: Agriculture
Effect 0: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, draw and score a card of value one higher than the card you returned.

Name: Metalworking
Effect 0: Draw and reveal a 1. If it has a [Castle], score it and repeat this dogma effect. Otherwise, keep it.

Name: Mysticism
Effect 0: Draw and reveal a 1. If it is the same color as any card on your board, meld it and draw a 1.

Name: Sailing
Effect 0: Draw and meld a 1

Name: The Wheel
Effect 0: Draw two 1.

Name: Writing
Effect 0: Draw a 2

Name: Calendar
Effect 0: If you have more cards in your score pile than in your hand, draw two 3.

Name: Canal Building
Effect 0: You may exchange all the highest cards in your hand with all the highest cards in your score pile.

Name: Fermenting
Effect 0: Draw a 2 for every color on your board with one or more [Leaf].

Name: Mathematics
Effect 0: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, draw and meld a card of value one higher than the card you returned.

Name: Philosophy
Effect 0: You may splay left any one color of your cards.
Effect 1: You may score a card from your hand.

Name: Education
Effect 0: You may return the highest card from your score pile. If you do, draw a card of value two higher than the highest card remaining in your score pile.

Name: Engineering
Effect 0: I demand you transfer all top cards with a [Castle] from your board to my score pile!
Effect 1: You may splay your red cards left.

Name: Paper
Effect 0: You may splay your green or blue cards left.
Effect 1: Draw a 4 for every color you have splayed left.

Name: Anatomy
Effect 0: I DEMAND you return a card from your score pile! If you do, return a top card of equal value from your board!

Name: Colonialism
Effect 0: Draw and tuck a 3. If it has a [Crown], repeat this dogma effect.

Name: Experimentation
Effect 0: Draw and meld a 5.

Name: Invention
Effect 0: You may splay right any one color of your cards currently splayed left. If you do, draw and score a 4.
Effect 1: If you have five colors splayed, each in any direction, claim the Wonder achievement.

Name: Perspective
Effect 0: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, score a card from your hand for every two [Lightbulb] icons on your board.

Name: Printing Press
Effect 0: You may return a card from your score pile. If you do, draw a card of value two higher than the top purple card on your board.
Effect 1: You may splay your blue cards right.

Name: Astronomy
Effect 0: Draw and reveal a 6. If the card is green or blue, meld it and repeat this dogma effect.
Effect 1: If all non-purple top cards on your board are value 6 or higher, claim the Universe achievement.

Name: Chemistry
Effect 0: You may splay your blue cards right.
Effect 1: Draw and score a card of value one higher than the highest top card on your board and then return a card from your score pile.

Name: Measurement
Effect 0: You may reveal and return a card from your hand. If you do, splay that color of your cards right, and draw a card of value equal to the number of cards of that color on your board.

Name: Statistics
Effect 0: I demand you transfer all the highest cards in your score pile to your hand!
Effect 1: You may splay your yellow cards right.

Name: Steam Engine
Effect 0: Draw and tuck two 4, then score your bottom yellow card.

Name: Atomic Theory
Effect 0: You may splay your blue cards right.

Name: Canning
Effect 0: You may draw and tuck a 6. If you do, score all your top cards without a [Factory].
Effect 1: You may splay your yellow cards right.

Name: Industrialization
Effect 0: Draw and tuck a 6 for every color on your board with one or more [factory].
Effect 1: You may splay your red or purple cards right.

Name: Machine Tools
Effect 0: Draw and score a card of value equal to the highest card in your score pile.

Name: Metric System
Effect 0: If your green cards are splayed right, you may splay any one color of your cards right.
Effect 1: You may splay your green cards right.

Name: Bicycle
Effect 0: You may exchange all the cards in your hand with all the cards in your score pile. If you exchange one, you must exchange them all.

Name: Electricity
Effect 0: Return all your top cards without a [Factory], then draw an 8 for each card you returned.

Name: Flight
Effect 0: If your red cards are splayed up, you may splay any one color of your cards up.
Effect 1: You may splay your red cards up.

Name: Computers
Effect 0: You may splay your red cards or your green cards up.
Effect 1: Draw and meld a 10, then execute its non-demand dogma effects. Do not share them.

Name: Ecology
Effect 0: You may return a card from your hand. If you do, score a card from your hand and draw two 10.

Name: Genetics
Effect 0: Draw and meld a 10. Score all cards beneath it.

Name: A.I.
Effect 0: Draw and score a 10.
Effect 1: If Robotics and Software are top cards on any board, the single player with the lowest score wins.

Name: Globalization
Effect 0: I demand you return a top card with a [Leaf] on your board!
Effect 1: Draw and score a 6. If no player has more [Leaf] icons than [Factory] icons on their board, the single player with the most points wins.

Name: Miniaturization
Effect 0: You may return a card from your hand. If you returned a 10, draw a 10 for every different value of card in your score pile.

Name: Robotics
Effect 0: Score your top green card. Draw and meld a 10, then execute each of its non-demand dogma effects. Do not share them.

Name: Software
Effect 0: Draw and score a 10.
Effect 1: Draw and meld two 10, then execute each of the second cardâ€™s non-demand dogma effects. Do not share them.

Name: Stem Cells
Effect 0: You may score all cards from your hand. If you score one, you must score them all.

Name: The Internet
Effect 0: You may splay your green cards up.
Effect 2: Draw and meld a 10 for every two [Clock] icons on your board.
